sentence.Network_en: The defendant leant forward and spoke to his barrister, sotto voce.

sentence.Network_en: Hearing your sotto voce cursing from three rooms away.
sentence.Network_cn: 38即使隔了3个房间也能听到你的嘀咕.

sentence.Network_en: He uttered a curse sotto voce.
